article_title: House Review: Medicaid: A Balancing Act — Part 1
article_text:
Claremore, OK (74018)

Today

Cloudy early with scattered thunderstorms developing this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 78F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: State Rep. Mark Lepak

og.description: Greetings from the state capitol! A few weeks ago, Nico Gomez, CEO of the Oklahoma Health Care Authority (OHCA), advised healthcare providers receiving Medicaid reimbursements that their rates might soon
